item.title: PowerShell TombStone revival
item.description: Our friend Darren Mar-Elia over at SDM software has just released some nice PowerShell cmdlets, toÂ view Tombstoned objects in AD… You can even revive(or reanimate them as I think the correct AD term is) them as well.
